column2: an A.M. Eatery////I got the Chili Verde Benedict with barbacoa which was TO DIE FOR. The eggs were perfectly poached
column3: I asked for the hash browns extra crispy and THEY DELIVERED
column4: and the barbacoa is just perfectly tender and juicy. It was so good
column5: I had to take one to go for my boyfriend to try--he was not disappointed either :)
